decision_conditions: The brickwork bond used shall match that used in the existing dwellinghouse.

The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless specifically otherwise hereby approved, such as the revised aluminium window details
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: First floor side extension; single storey rear extension; replacement windows; external alterations
